# Important Non-Statistics Stuff {.section}

## Some student groups that aim to build a better future

- [Organised students for radical climate action](https://www.instagram.com/orca_amsterdam/?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igshid=OGQ5ZDc2ODk2ZA%3D%3D) 
- [UvA Green Office:](https://www.instagram.com/uvagreenoffice/?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igshid=OGQ5ZDc2ODk2ZA%3D%3D) Student-run platform striving to make the University of Amsterdam a greener place
- [Amsterdam Autonomous coalition:](https://amsterdamautonomouscoalition.hotglue.me/) Coalition of Amsterdam-based students & staff that aim to decolonise, democratise and decarbonise the universities of Amsterdam
